name: Airship Killer
description:
airplane killer - We only dream of peace - the enemies are preparing a treacherous attack on your homeland, which you simply cannot forgive them. In this sidescroll shooter, you board your plane and go to the enemy's lair to destroy it once and for all! Use all possible tricks and tactics in order not to lose in this dishonest battle, collect bonuses and first-aid kits and blow them all up! Can you overcome all the incredible levels and get to the very end?

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack by Ozzed
